excerpt: Humphrey Bogart plays a Runyonesque gambler who stumbles onto a Nazi spy ring after his favorite cheesecake baker is murdered.
title: All Through the Night

excerpt: Homely Dr. Jekyll’s serum transforms him into the dashing, sociopathic Edward Hyde—who promptly torments Jekyll’s unfaithful wife and her lover, Jekyll’s backstabbing best friend, Christopher Lee.
title: The Two Faces of Dr. Jekyll

excerpt: Caribbean pirate Burt Lancaster captures a British ship, schemes to sell its arms twice over, then falls for a rebel leader’s daughter and switches sides.
title: The Crimson Pirate

excerpt: Ten years after the Jigsaw killer’s death, police investigate a fresh set of murders bearing his MO while a group of strangers endure one of his “games”.
title: Jigsaw

excerpt: A nurse in wartime England endures personal and professional hardships while remaining true to her vocation.
title: Vigil in the Night
